mapper.select: select cc.*, cu1.name as fname, cu1.head_portrait, cu2.name AS tname from common_comment cc left join common_user cu1 ON cc.from_uid = cu1.id LEFT JOIN common_user cu2 ON cu2.id = cc.to_uid where cc.object_type = #{object_type} and cc.object_id = #{object_id} order by cc.reply_time desc
select count(1) as count from common_comment where object_type = #{object_type} and object_id = #{object_id}
